00021 class cAnimFrameData {
00022         public:
00023                 BITMAP *bmp;
00024                 
00025                 int xo,yo; // Offset for this bitmap
00026                 
00028                 double t;
00029 };
00030 
00032 class cAnimSeqData {
00033         public:
00035                 std::vector<class cAnimFrameData *>fd;
00036                 
00037                 double maxt; // Cumulative length of sequence in seconds
00038                 std::string next;
00039                 
00040                 int id; // Numerical ID for this sequence
00041                 
00043                 cAnimFrameData *new_frame(BITMAP *bmp, int xof, int yof, double tm) {
00044                     cAnimFrameData *tmp = new cAnimFrameData;
00045                     
00046                     // Setting frame data
00047                     tmp->bmp = bmp;
00048                     tmp->xo = xof;
00049                     tmp->yo = yof;
00050                     tmp->t = tm;
00051                     maxt+=tm;
00052                     
00053                     fd.push_back(tmp);
00054                     return tmp;
00055                 }
00056 };
00057 
00059 class cAnimData {
00060         public:
00062                 std::map<std::string,cAnimSeqData *>
00063                         sqd;
00064                 
00067                 std::vector<cAnimSeqData *>sqv;
00068                 
00070                 cAnimSeqData *new_sequence(std::string id, std::string next="") {
00071                     cAnimSeqData *tmp = new cAnimSeqData;   // Allocating memory
00072                     sqd[id] = tmp;                          // Pushing it into the sequence map
00073                     
00074                     tmp->id = sqv.size();                   // Gets the sequence ID
00075                     sqv.push_back(tmp);                     // Pushing it into the sequence vector
00076                     
00077                     tmp->next = next;                       // Defining the "next" frame for the sequence
00078                     tmp->maxt = 0.0;                        // Zero as it has no frames
00079                     return tmp;                             // Returning the allocated sequence pointer
00080                 }
00081 };
